---
title: "count while dicing"
---

```{r, include=FALSE}
options(knitr.duplicate.label = "allow")
knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.width = 6, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, comment = "", cache = F, echo = F)
library(flipbookr)
```


```{r build, echo = F}
library(tidyverse)
mtcars %>% 
  ggplot() +
  aes(x = "all") +
  geom_bar(position = position_dodge2(preserve = "single")) + 
  stat_count(geom = "text",
             aes(label = ..count..),
             position = 
               position_dodge2(width = 1,
                              preserve = "single")) + #BREAK
  aes(x = factor(vs)) + #BREAK
  aes(fill = factor(gear)) + #BREAK
  facet_grid(factor(cyl)~.) #BREAK
```

```{r, echo = T}
embed_flipbook("build", font_size = 90, 
               use_embed_xaringan = T,
               break_type = "user")
```
